template: <metadata> <purpose>Compare and contrast data points or sets</purpose> <output_format>Structured comparison</output_format> </metadata> <input> <instructions>{INSTRUCTIONS}</instructions> <data>{DATA}</data> </input> <analysis_framework> <comparison_structure> <similarities> <key_matches>Notable matching patterns</key_matches> <shared_trends>Common trends across datasets</shared_trends> </similarities> <differences> <key_divergences>Notable differences</key_divergences> <unique_patterns>Dataset-specific patterns</unique_patterns> </differences> <metrics> <quantitative>Numerical comparisons</quantitative> <qualitative>Contextual differences</qualitative> </metrics> </comparison_structure> <visualization>Comparative charts and tables</visualization> </analysis_framework>
